website_summaries.verdict: The Nike Downshifter 9 is among Nike’s best value-for-money performance running shoes. It features a simple yet stylish design that is ideal for regular runs, workout sessions, and everyday wear. This neutral running shoe delivers the necessary protection and support that fit the needs of runners and athletes of all levels. It is suitable for consumers seeking flexibility, comfort, and versatility.
pros: Many satisfied users mentioned that Nike Downshifter 9 is comfortable to wear
A lot of people appreciated the shoe’s lightweight structure
Some purchasers said that this running companion is supportive
The shoe is very flexible, according to several commenters
A few consumers confirmed that this running shoe is breathable
Buyers are happy that the price for a pair of the Downshifter 9 is affordable
Numerous reviewers commented that this shoe is stylish
This running partner is also suitable for workouts and casual wear, based on reviews
cons: A handful of wearers complained that the Nike Downshifter 9 does not offer enough cushioning
The upper of the shoe is not durable enough for running, said a couple of runners
A few testers reported that this shoe felt a bit narrow for them

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable quality shoes for running or casual use.
customer_reviews.text: I have used these Nike running shoes for the gym on regular basis and they keep me working well. They don't weigh me down so they help me feel light on my feet whether I'm jogging or running. The shoes are strong and easy to put on, and have a comfort to be worn all day without issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jahan Miah

customer_reviews.title: Look even better in the hand and on the foot
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure about these as entirely black trainers, but they look great. Styling is sharp, with a subtle silver shine to the front of the foot. These can be used as a work trainer where possible. They are a little slim and slightly long in the toe but otherwise fit very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mildly Aloof

customer_reviews.title: Budget shoes value for money
customer_reviews.text: In a big fan of Nike I've worn them for 30 years these are budget shows for every day use , no real problem But I didn't know the insoles where glued in and couldn't be removed or changed ,slightly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: M LOWE

customer_reviews.title: I hate running, and yet...
customer_reviews.text: ... these made it a pleasure. Previously I was using a pair of trainers that were older than my kids (one is 14...) while I did the Couch to 5K during The Great British Lockdown Of 2020. These made such a difference! Lightweight, comfy, not falling apart. For a while, running actually became fun. No issues at all. Feet felt protected, and yet unencumbered (because they're so light). Fit was good. Even just typing this, I feel like I need to get back into the running again. When I've worn the current pair out, I shall buy another set of these.
customer_reviews.author: Lawboy1976

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable for daily walkers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes and expected them to be comfortable for walking in but the inside of the shoes (size 5.5 in the photo) is very hard and there is little comfort. Although the outer sole of the shoe does provide support, I do not like wearing the shoes when walking long distances, especially outside. The shoes look great but the practical issue of being comfortable is not achieved. I think that they may be acceptable for occasional use but not for daily use when walking. The comfort has been increased a bit by inserting shoe stretchers with socks on them and also by putting them into hot water to widen them.
customer_reviews.author: M.Gon

customer_reviews.title: Good trainers.
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old son claims he runs like Lasse Viren in these.
customer_reviews.author: John4613

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Not as cushioned as I would want. But, value for money. Also the first order size was too small, but the return and exchange process was very easy and straight forward. Good product and company.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but ruined within 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Initially very comfortable and nice looking shoes. I’ve had these for just about 5 months now and have been using them for regular running and cycling (4-5 times a week). The thin fabric covering has now worn through in several places and is worse by the day. They won’t last much longer at all. It’s a shame that these are not sturdier as I hate having to throw away shoes. I will be looking for something much more durable in the future and would not recommend these trainers to anybody who plans on using them frequently for exercise as they’re clearly not made to withstand it.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent running/gym shoes
customer_reviews.text: Use these as my gym shoes, very comfortable and offer great support if running, or performing any exercise
customer_reviews.author: George McCauley

customer_reviews.title: Holes near thumb in 1 month usage
customer_reviews.text: They were comfortable and felt really good for running. BUT In one month of mild running, there are holes on both shoes where my leg thumb would stick out. hate these shoes with nets, they always gets these holes sooner than later. Very disappointing for such mid range costly shoes. Would expect to last atleast 6 month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as robust as hoped
customer_reviews.text: After a month of walking locally around 5 miles a day the inside has already worn through inside the heel on both trainers. I can still wear them comfortably, but expected more.
customer_reviews.author: BeanieDad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! I was indecisive at first because of some negative reviews,but fortunately I have them. I am into sports since a child and know when a shoe is good. This one is the absolute value for money!!
customer_reviews.author: Kyriakos

customer_reviews.title: Blue not black
customer_reviews.text: Bought as birthday present for my brother, a new runner, who says they’re great and very comfy although we thought they were black from the photo and they’re blue. He didn’t mind.
customer_reviews.author: Zuzu

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Like the comfort and fit , will be used mainly for running
customer_reviews.author: dwprice

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very light but not very comfortable, cushion effect not very good. Developed knee pains after using it twice - for running and HIIT.
customer_reviews.author: Wendus

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived much quicker than I expected - excellent service - Nice shoes too!
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: Gets me from A to B
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable and great for the price. Gets me from A to B.
customer_reviews.author: Trafford1240

customer_reviews.title: Chuffed!
customer_reviews.text: Really chuffed with these - only 1 week into owning them and let to wear on long run, but arrived swiftly, really comfy and been good support for my feet during home workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoes for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes for everyday casual wearing, though I didn't try to run with it. The only issue is that you usually need to buy 1 size larger than your actual foot size. But AFAIK that's a generic Nike phenomenon.
customer_reviews.author: Nagy Richárd

customer_reviews.title: Hard base
customer_reviews.text: The base is hard and does not bend enough while walking , it better getting the downshifter 7
customer_reviews.author: varun

customer_reviews.title: Get bigger size
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my boyfriend birthday, size 10 basically size 9 so buy bigger than you need. They refunded us.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality / Faulty
customer_reviews.text: Shoe developed a hole in the top after only a couple of uses, have returned, i previously had a pair which lasted 9 months, so must be faulty
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Came slightly smaller than my other size 9 nikes
customer_reviews.text: Nice trainers, were smaller than my other size 9 nikes. However no quible exchange for a 9.5 very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Fitzo

customer_reviews.title: So good I bought a second pair
customer_reviews.text: Already have a black pair. Was so impressed by the comfort I bought another pair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Appear as expected. Shipping time slightly longer due to them being shipped from Spain but not by much.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Cawley

customer_reviews.title: Quality not good
customer_reviews.text: After just a month of not much use there is a hole at the toe of one shoe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: compare with others before buying
customer_reviews.text: my wife's son said the nike downshifter is fake as many logos are missing from the trainer.. he compared with JD WILLIAMS ...!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Wiltshire

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The product is ok though not the quality I had expected from Nike. It's an average product, not of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mahbub Morshed

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: The comfort provided from these trainers are absolutely amazing, can not fault them
customer_reviews.author: J. Batehup

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Nike Running Trainers
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product and amazing price. They look good and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: P.rky

customer_reviews.title: great product and delivery
customer_reviews.text: great product....great delivery [ahead of time]....very very happy ...thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.author: derek hoey

customer_reviews.title: Good product . The size of the shoe fits the foot exactly
customer_reviews.text: Good product . The size of the shoe fits the foot exactly
customer_reviews.author: Benny Ivgi

customer_reviews.title: Style and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Perfect trainers looking stylish super comfy and puts a spring in your step
customer_reviews.author: charles

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Downshifter 9 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Adjustable comfort and breathable support. The Nike Downshifter 9 running shoe is made of lightweight mesh and features an adjustable arch on the arch for comfort, breathability and personalized support from start to finish. Lightweight mesh for breathable comfort. Adjustable band on the arch for a personalized support. Ultra-soft foam cushioning and durable rubber sole for ideal traction and durability. Flex grooves that allow the shoe to follow the natural movements of the foot.
feature_bullets: RUNNING SHOES FOR MEN: The Nike Downshifter 9 running shoe lets you take your sprints and runs to new levels.
COMFORTABLE FIT: Men's Nike shoes feature open mesh at the forefoot that is lightweight and breathable, keeping you comfortable throughout your run.
DURABLE DESIGN: Closed mesh through the midfoot and heel provides structured support to our men's sneakers while the textured outsole provides additional traction and durability.
RESILIENT RIDE: Men's shoes with an articulated, full-length midsole that provides resilient and flexible cushioning, while the no-sew midfoot saddle delivers support.
RUN FREELY: Flex grooves provide traction and let your feet move naturally in your Nike running shoes and the soft, smooth midsole cushions your stride.
